topics.body: Back from my nap
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
Too_Offensive was chillin’ out in his caddy smokin’ on some dank weed with his homie, Carca$$ $trife. "drop it like it’s hot" was blastin’ from the from the speakers. The woofers was spittin out that dope ass bass line and shit.

"Sheeit, this some dank ass weed", Too_Offensive said puffin’ on the fattie.

"Yo, lemme get another puff of that, niggah", Carca$$ said.

"Fuck naw man, you smoked 3/4 of the bag, so fuck you dawg".

Too_Offensive kicked up his feet on the dashboard. He was wearing some sick ass J’S. He reached into his and pulled out a fat stack of benjamins. As he counted his stack, his dumbass noticed the bills was fake.

“Fuck, fuck, fuck!”, he yelled, despite being high off his ass.

“What the fuck nigga?”, Carca$$ asked.

“Yo. YO! The nigga Jeffarius man, he gave me some fake ass bills, dawg!”, he kicked the dashboard, “that was the last of my damn coke!”

“Well shit”, carca$$ said not really giving a fuck.

Within the stack of money was a note. Offensive, taking notice of it, pulled it out, it read ‘lol nigga’ in large letters.

“What’s that say, man?”, carcass asked as he wheezed.

Offensive tossed the note to him. Carca$$ read it to himself silently, then began to laugh uncontrollably.

“Yo’ asss got scammed, hah!”
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00
